name: Easy Baked Pork Chops
author: Kate Lucas
summary: Try this easy recipe to prepare flavorful, juicy baked pork chops in the oven without marinating.
ingredients: 4 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease a 9x13-inch baking pan with oil
Scatter onions evenly into the baking pan
Place pork chops on top of onions in the pan
Combine maple syrup, mustard, garlic, red pepper, chili powder, and salt together in a small bowl
Pour mixture evenly over pork chops
Cover baking dish with aluminum foil
Bake in the preheated oven until chops are no longer pink in the center and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads 160 degrees F (71 degrees C), 1 to 1 1/2 hours
